titleStmt.title: An account of the behaviour, confession and last dying speech of Sir John johnson who was executed at Tyburn, on Tuesday the 23d day of December. anno Dom. 1690. for stealing of Mrs. Mary VVharton, in company of Captain james Campbel and Archibald Montgomery, since fled.
titleStmt.author: Johnston, John, Sir, d. 1690.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
